Sentence: Major capsid protein fragments were sequenced with three strategies, i. e., clone - library Sanger sequencing ( about 100 reads), shallow Illumina sequencing ( 1, 0002, 000 reads), and deep Illumina sequencing ( more than 100, 000 reads).

The barcoded amplicons were quantified using a Qubit fluorometer with Quant - iT dsDNA BR assay kit ( Invitrogen, USA), and each amplicon was adjusted to equimolar concentration according to the Illumina protocol for 16S Metagenomic Sequencing Library Preparation.

Methods Metagenomic datasets Sequencing of several shotgun metagenomic datasets as well as assembly and binning of the AGa genome bin was performed in its entirety in a previous study [ 9] and is briefly summarized here: the assembly of 268Gbp of HiSeq metagenomic sequence resulted in 179, 092 scaffolds, of which the 65 largest ranged in size from 0. 5 to 1. 5Mbp.
Bioinformatic analyses Sequence reads from 16S rRNA gene amplicons, nifH gene amplicons, and metagenomes were demultiplexed using the Illumina MiSeq Reporter ( MSR) version 2. 5. 1.

Metatranscriptome sequencing and analysis For the metatranscriptomic analysis, the RNA triplicate samples of the biofilm and planktonic phases were pooled again as described for 16S rRNA gene amplicon sequencing.

Samples were pooled in order to obtain sufficient DNA for each respective sequencing library; for 16S rRNA gene amplicon analysis, subsamples collected on 26 June ( 01: 00 PDT) and 27 June ( 16: 00 PDT) were pooled ( 250 m total depth resolution) and for metagenome sequencing subsamples collected on 26 June ( 16: 00 PDT) were combined ( 1 mm total depth resolution for a total of five metagenome libraries).
